custom_file_extensions.description: Used for settings custom file extensions for a given language. ```json { "custom_file_extensions": { "rust": ".rust" } } ```

format_finished_document.description: Format the processed document with the selected markdown formatter.

javascript_runtime.description:
Set npm script runner runtime.

Should be considered experimental since not all tools support being run using Bun/Deno.

`node -> npx`

`bun -> bunx`

`deno -> deno run`

languages.description: Defines which formatter is used by the language. ```json { "languages": { "rust": "rustfmt", "js": "prettier" } } ```

oneOf.description:
Static checker for GitHub Actions workflow files

[https://github.com/rhysd/actionlint](https://github.com/rhysd/actionlint)

`actionlint $PATH`

A code formatter for R

[https://posit-dev.github.io/air/formatter.html](https://posit-dev.github.io/air/formatter.html)

`air format $PATH`

The Uncompromising Nix Code Formatter

[https://github.com/kamadorueda/alejandra](https://github.com/kamadorueda/alejandra)

`alejandra --quiet $PATH`

Catch insensitive, inconsiderate writing

[https://github.com/get-alex/alex](https://github.com/get-alex/alex)

`alex $PATH`

A static code analysis tool for Crystal

[https://github.com/crystal-ameba/ameba](https://github.com/crystal-ameba/ameba)

`ameba --fix $PATH`

ansible-lint checks playbooks for practices and behavior that could potentially be improved and can fix some of the most common ones for you

[https://github.com/ansible/ansible-lint](https://github.com/ansible/ansible-lint)

`ansible-lint $PATH`

Go Assembler Formatter

[https://github.com/klauspost/asmfmt](https://github.com/klauspost/asmfmt)

`asmfmt -w $PATH`

A Free, Fast, and Small Automatic Formatter for C, C++, C++/CLI, Objective-C, C#, and Java Source Code

[https://gitlab.com/saalen/astyle](https://gitlab.com/saalen/astyle)

`astyle --quiet $PATH`

Adds the Optional type-hint to arguments where the default value is None

[https://github.com/luttik/auto-optional](https://github.com/luttik/auto-optional)

`auto-optional $PATH`

A linter and formatter to help you to improve copywriting, correct spaces, words, and punctuations between CJK (Chinese, Japanese, Korean)

[https://github.com/huacnlee/autocorrect](https://github.com/huacnlee/autocorrect)

`autocorrect --fix $PATH`

Removes unused imports and unused variables as reported by pyflakes

[https://github.com/pycqa/autoflake](https://github.com/pycqa/autoflake)

`autoflake --quiet --in-place $PATH`

A tool that automatically formats Python code to conform to the PEP 8 style guid

[https://github.com/hhatto/autopep8](https://github.com/hhatto/autopep8)

`autopep8 --in-place $PATH`

Code style enforcement for bash programs

[https://github.com/openstack/bashate](https://github.com/openstack/bashate)

`bashate $PATH`

Opinionated code formatter, just like Python's black code formatter but for Beancount

[https://github.com/launchplatform/beancount-black](https://github.com/launchplatform/beancount-black)

`bean-black $PATH`

A Bash beautifier for the masses

`beautysh $PATH`

Cleaner and Formatter for BibTeX files

`bibtex-tidy -m $PATH`

[https://github.com/azure/bicep](https://github.com/azure/bicep)

`bicep format $PATH`

Runs biome formatter, linter and import sorting with unsafe fixes on the input

[https://biomejs.dev/reference/cli/#biome-check](https://biomejs.dev/reference/cli/#biome-check)

`biome check --write $PATH`

Runs biome formatter, linter and import sorting on the input

`biome check --write --unsafe $PATH`

Runs the biome formatter on input

`biome format --write $PATH`

Runs the biome linter on input

`biome lint --write $PATH`

`biome lint --write --unsafe $PATH`

The uncompromising Python code formatter

`black --quiet $PATH`

`blade-formatter --write $PATH`

`blue --quiet $PATH`

[https://github.com/sibprogrammer/xq](https://github.com/sibprogrammer/xq)

`xq --html`

A simple opinionated yaml formatter that keeps your comments

[https://github.com/lyz-code/yamlfix](https://github.com/lyz-code/yamlfix)

`yamlfix $PATH`

An extensible command line tool or library to format yaml files

[https://github.com/google/yamlfmt](https://github.com/google/yamlfmt)

`yamlfmt -quiet $PATH`

A formatter for Python files

[https://github.com/google/yapf](https://github.com/google/yapf)

`yapf --in-place $PATH`

Code formatter for the Yew framework

[https://github.com/its-the-shrimp/yew-fmt](https://github.com/its-the-shrimp/yew-fmt)

`yew-fmt --edition 2021 --quiet $PATH`

yq is a portable command-line YAML, JSON, XML, CSV, TOML and properties processor

[https://github.com/mikefarah/yq](https://github.com/mikefarah/yq)

`yq --inplace $PATH`

Reformat Zig source into canonical form

`zig fmt $PATH`

Formats Ziggy documents and Ziggy schemas

[https://ziggy-lang.io/documentation/ziggy-fmt/](https://ziggy-lang.io/documentation/ziggy-fmt/)

`ziggy fmt $PATH`

Executables beautifully format Clojure and Clojurescript source code and s-expressions

`zprint -w $PATH`
